title: Major East Asian investors launch a $100 million Web3 fund in Dubai
description:
South Korean gaming giant Wemade (WEMIX) teamed up with Whampoa Digital, the technology investment arm of Singapore’s Whampoa Group, to launch a $100 million Web3 fund for driving digital asset initiatives in the Middle East. According to a Dec. 22 statement, Whampoa Digital will join the WEMIX PLAY Center within the Dubai International Financial Centre […]

title: FSRA updates AML rules to safeguard UAE’s financial landscape
description: In a move aimed at bolstering its stance against money laundering, terrorism financing, and proliferation financing, the Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA) of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) has announced significant updates to its Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Sanctions Rules and Guidance, collectively known as the AML Rulebook. Strengthened measures against financial crimes The revisions […]

title: China’s Central Bank addresses crypto regulation in new financial stability report
description: In a groundbreaking move, the People’s Bank of China (PBoC) has included a dedicated section on cryptocurrency assets in its latest financial stability report.  The report marks the first instance where the PBoC officially acknowledges and addresses concerns related to cryptocurrencies and decentralized finance (DeFi). This development emphasizes the need for global regulatory cooperation in […]

title: Polygon’s MATIC Shows Bullish Momentum As Total Value Locked (TVL) Surges To $6,275,266,756
description: Polygon’s MATIC has recently taken a significant leap in the Total Value Locked (TVL) metric, surpassing major blockchain players like Ethereum, Solana, and Arbitrium. title: FixedFloat Hits 1.5M Swaps in 2023 and Expands Crypto Pairs
description:
